text.name: sys_description
text.text: Future Pinball is a real-time pinball development system. It lets you design and play your own real-time 3D pinball simulation. It uses advanced physics to provide the best possible simulation of a realistic pinball machine. Table logic is scripted in 'Visual Basic Scripting'. The scripts are designed to be simple yet flexible enough to allow the creation of a wide variety of original games. The engine also supports sound effects and music on multiple channels.
